You may put a creature that costs 6 or less from the top of your deck or your hand into the battle zone.) ■ Whenever you put another creature into the battle zone, this creature wins all battles until the end of the turn.

property.value: {GALAXYSHIELD} {LW5} (You may pay Light/Water 5 instead of the cost of using this card. Until the start of your next turn, they can't attack or block.

Put one of them into your hand, and put the other into your mana zone tapped. {POWERED BREAKER} (This creature breaks an additional shield for each 6000 power.)} ■ This creature gets +1000 power for each card in your mana zone.

property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature gets -5000 power until the end of the turn. {ONITIME}: If you and your opponent have a total of 6 or less shields, each of your creatures gets "blocker" and "slayer".

property.value: {MACH FIGHTER} (This creature can attack tapped or untapped creatures on the turn you put it.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, put the top card of your deck into your graveyard, then put a card from your graveyard into your mana zone. ■ When this creature is destroyed, put a creature that costs 10 or less from your mana zone into the battle zone. {FUSHIGIVERSE} Darkness/Nature 1 2 (You may put one of your creatures into your mana zone tapped to summon this creature from your graveyard for a cost equal to Darkness/Nature 1 2 minus that creature's cost. It can't cost less than Darkness/Nature 2.)
